resources.string:
Hello, I am your friendly neighbourhood programmer!

Floating Image is a spare time project created in part as an attempt to bring a bit of eye candy to Android, in part to get some experience programming for the platform. Images from various sources are streamed to the phone.

Images with a blue glow have just been downloaded, where images with shadow are either taken from the phone locally, or from an image cache - not to worry, the cache is fairly small.

Some Controls:
Navigate stream: Swipe your finger sideways.
Pick image: Tap on it.
Go to image homepage: Long click when selected.

More features are in the works, but I will of course gladly take advice on what would make this the killer application for you!

This application is free as in speech, which means that you may at any time request the code (I would however like improvements to float my way). It is also free as in beer, which means that if you like it, and happen to run into me, I encourage you to buy me a beer!
The gears are grinding... Please wait
